column4: News;Takeo Province:------ A drunken man (article says a teacher several times) was returning home after a session on the sauce and spotted a cow sleeping at the side of the road.------Feeling a bit horny
column5: the man decided to chance a bit of sex on the beast
column6: but the cow wasn’t in the mood and kicked the would be rapist in his family jewels.------Enraged by this physical rejection
column7: the suspect took a knife and killed
column8: then mutilated the unfortunate bovine victim.------ The owner of the cow complained to police
column9: who arrested drunk and will proceed with legal action.------This rather unusual incident happened on September 26
column11: the suspect (Neck Neturn??) said that before the incident on the night of September 26
column13: he went drinking with friends in the village until he became drunk and walked home. After arriving at the scene
column14: he found a cow that was sleeping near the road
column15: causing a sexual arousal. Whilst enjoying the act
column16: suddenly the cow was surprised and booted him in the testicles. The man then pulled a knife and cut the cow
column17: and in a rage ‘shredded’ it.------After the incident
column18: the owner of the cow hurried to report the crime to the police
column19: who arrested the above suspect and will proceed according to the law (which one(s) are unclear).------ ------https://nokorthom.com/2018/09/%E1%9E%82%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%9A%E1%9E%BC%E1%9E%94%E1%9E%84%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%9A%E1%9F%80%E1%9E%93%E1%9E%85%E1%9E%B6%E1%9E%94%E1%9F%8B%E1%9E%9A%E1%9F%86%E1%9E%9B%E1%9F%84%E1%9E%97%E1%9E%98%E1%9F%81%E1%9E%82/------ ------ ------I------After the incident
